ow.tool.util.shellframework
クラス ShellServer<T>

java.lang.Object
  ow.tool.util.shellframework.ShellServer<T>
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class ShellServer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

DHT shell server. An instance of this class wraps a DHT instance.

ShellServer

                   java.util.List<Command<T>> commandList,
                   MessagePrinter showPromptPrinter,
                   MessagePrinter noCommandPrinter,

                   T applicationDependentData,
                   int port,
                   AccessController ac)
A constructor.

パラメータ:
applicationDependentData - in case of DHT server, a DHT instance which has been initialized.
port - the port number on which this instance waits for incoming connections.
